overview: Working with wood all day can be boring, but for these musclebound hunks, there’s always another kind of wood to hand, one that’s a lot harder and a lot more fun to play with. Taking their minds off the job at hand, they get busy with each other, filling their mouths and butts with the stiffest, biggest dicks ever seen in the workshop! From famed fucker Kayden Gray ploughing the handsome Logan Moore to Spanish stud Antonio Miracle fucking the life out of fellow tattooed musclemen Jason and Russ, the workshop soon fills with the scent of sweat and spunk as well as sawdust as balls are emptied and the sweat drips off the men mid-fuck, leaving everything scorching hot and soaked in the tastiest spunk ever delivered
title: Hard Labour
